title: Authentic Learning Design Workshop for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and ability to interpret work-related data
context.additional_context: Implementing science data analysis and problem-solving tasks reflecting real workplace contexts in a microlearning environment accessible via mobile devices for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific data collected from real-world work environments to derive key insights.
Learners can collaborate with peers and stakeholders to design practical solutions for scientific problem-solving.
Learners can structure scientific decision-making processes into three stages (problem definition–analysis–proposal) using mobile-based microlearning tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
